name: High Speed Image Analysis for MATLAB
short_description:
High-speed imaging is a powerful tool for capturing fast events, but converting qualitative video observations to quantitative analysis is challenging.

This toolbox is being developed to support analysis of high-speed video in Hall thrusters and other plasma devices.  In particular, it enables visualization and Fourier analysis of rotating spoke instabilities in the annular Hall thruster discharge channel.

We currently have two developers but are always open to more.  Feedback is also encouraged!
summary: An integrated toolbox for MATLAB analysis of high-speed video
